_sText:
zm_fortress_b7 - Changelog

zm_fortress_b7 - Changelog

Created by [#OMEGA] - K2

Preface: This is my first offical multiplayer map; I deceided to create a zombie mod because zombie mod owns. Orginally it was crated for a clan out of a HLÂ² Map (which was created just for SP ^^), but this clan kicked me so I won't work for the clan anymore. This map is independent now ^^
Map Information: This is somekind of a fortress build by humans and overtaken by the combines during the war. Now it is abonded and the combine and thair human slaves disappeared without a trace. Blood and somekind of "Headcrabs" were found here; according to roumors zombies were seen in the fortress... Now it's about you to find out what really happened here... Good Luck soldier!
Version Info:
Version: Beta 7
Released: 23.02.2009 (January)
Spawnpoints: 32 T, 32 CT (64 Total)
Notes: Map files bspzipped except for mapoverview, Map Skybox (mpa100) made by Karatekäfer
Compiling Time: vbsp.exe 11s vvis.exe 17s vrad.exe (LDR) 7min 34s vrax.exe (HDR) 6min 44s
Total: 14min 46s
Contact @ (no spam):
Email: omegak2@gmx.de
ICQ: 192-355-651
MSN: omegak2@hotmail.de
Zombie Server: 81.19.209.199:27200
My Community: www.g4tc.net
Please do not ask about the secrets!
Changelog:
  • changelog and zm_fortress_b7.txt changed and updated ;D
  • custom content was included in the .bsp file (.txt, .nav, textures, overview)
  • the spot on the vent thingys above t spawn has been removed...
  • eyecandy added:
    • the vent thingys emit sparks and steam now
    • many brush railings were replaced with prop railings
  • added signs with the names of the areas
  • changed storage room 3 (improved spots)
  • balanced the spot over the stairs (it will break with 2 or more cts)
  • changed the office room connected to the vent (hopefully a bit more useful now)
  • changed the room connected to the sewers (props added)
  • Unnecessary faces removed:
    • bedrooms
    • entrace room (next to t spawn)
    • (100+) in the computer room (above t spawn)
    • on the railings...
    • sewers room
    • bathrooms
    • canals entrances(removed 16 brushes per entrance too)
  • removed a litte bug in the sewers room
  • added/improved spots in the computer room (above t spawn)
  • applied some prop fade dists to some stuff in the computer room (above t spawn)
  • increased the length of the way to the first bedroom
  • fixed some bush sizes
  • map overview added
  • some fade distances changed and min fade dists for some props added
  • the secrets in the bathroom were fixed (finally... omg)
  • Lightning changes:
    • HDR Lightning
    • Overall lightning is darker now
    • Added lightblockers to the sewers entrances (surfrace)
    • Added lightblocker to the door in the sewer room
    • Added lightblocker to computer room (above t spawn)
    • lightscale in dark areas increased
    • Amout of lights reduced
    • light colors in every area changed
    • fixed guardhouse light
  • some unnecessary cubemaps removed
  • some cubemap sizes reduced in dark areas and in certain rooms
  • new spot added (trash dumpster)
  • fixed 2 texture bugs in the bathroom
  • added new skybox
  • removed some ambient sounds
  • added a lot of soundscapes
  • fixed a texture bug in way between the bombsite and the storage room (next to the sewer entrance)
  • fixed a texture bug in the big vent
  • the radios emit sounds now ;)
  • some existing areaportals have been improved
  • some more areaportals have been added
  • occluder sizes fixed
  • ads added
Planned for new Versions:
  • rework of some more lights
  • .nav file with place names (FINAL RELEASE)
  • adding some more props
  • ragdolls/blood
  • [decals (maybe more)]
  • [Sounds (maybe more)]
  • using higher/better lightmaps
Always planned:
  • bugfixes (If I find some or someone report bugs)
  • balancing
Installation: Just do the following steps to install the map:
  • copy the folders except fastdl into your ..\cstrike\ folder
  • add the map to your mapcycle.txt/maplist.txt/votemaplist.txt
  • if you are using sv_downloadurl upload the contents of fastdl to your webserver
Zip-File should contain:

If one of these files is missing please redownload the map; I offically uploaded them on fpsbanana, rapidshare and the zombiemod website only.
Special thanks to: Iaquinta - for testing a lot and giving suggestions gameplay and design wise (A HUGE THANK YOU) Games - for testing and giving suggestions Tyranastrasz - for testing and giving suggestions Grey Echo - testing Moonlight - testing [ZFC] idm - for giving a constructive feedback on fpsbanana :) Visit the Offical Zombie Mod Studios Page!
